fields.description: As one of the engineering week decisions, we will move the iOS-only {{Ti.UI.iOS. Stepper}} core-component to an own module in 7.0.0 and deprecate the core-component to remove it from the core in 8.0.0.
fields.summary: iOS: Deprecate Ti.UI.iOS.TabbedBar, move to own module "Ti.TabbedBar"

comments.body:
Change of plans.

We plan on adding {{TabbedBar}} support to Android in Titanium 8.0.0.
Please see: [TIMOB-25953]

So, instead of moving this out of the core SDK, we'll be keeping it. But moving it from {{Ti.UI.iOS}} to {{Ti.UI}}.
